greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Restricted growth sequence transform of A046523(A281978(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65535
program: prev=1; n = 2; while(n < up_to+1, try = prev; while(mapisdefined(minverses,try) || !(pd = least_unused_proper_divisor(minverses,try)), try += prev); mapput(minverses,v281978[n] = try,n); mapput(minverses,v281978[1+n] = pd,1+n); prev = pd; n += 2);

rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ From A046523
xref: Compare also to the scatter plots of A304098, A304729 and A304732.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 19 2018
